page.title: ServerlessDays Cardiff - David Carboni
page.description: What happens when you have a shiny ML model to detect mangroves, access to a global satellite imagery open dataset and want to serve it to customers ad-hoc without full time infrastructure?

speaker.name: David Carboni
speaker.title: Co-Founder & head geek (Technology Director) at NotBinary
speaker.bio: Culture, technology and digital transformation. Practical technology design & delivery. Work hard be kind. Co-Founder & head geek (Technology Director) at NotBinary. Simple, thoughtful, user-centred technology design.

talk.title: Detecting mangrove forests with serverless
talk.abstract: What happens when you have a shiny ML model to detect mangroves, access to a global satellite imagery open dataset and want to serve it to customers ad-hoc without full time infrastructure?
